title: [K-12] Online Teacher Professional Development: Web-Based Task Design for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and experience in secondary mathematics education
context.additional_context: A process for mathematics educators to develop online task design competencies in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, focusing on solving real classroom problems through project-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can design math education tasks for English language learners (ELLs) using web-based tools
Learners can analyze and improve the pedagogical effectiveness of tasks developed through project-based assessment
Learners can integrate technological-pedagogical-content knowledge (TPACK) when designing online assignments based on peer feedback

resources: Mathematics Instruction Case Database for ELLs (English Language Learners)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
